metadata.title: CVE-2021-30589 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Sharing in Google Chromeprior to 92.0.4515.107 allowed a remote attacker to bypass navigationrestrictions via a crafted click-to-call link.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
